metadata.feature_description: Configure Publisher module settings including display options, social sharing, and behavior

steps.action: Navigate to News page and click on Publisher Settings gear icon
steps.expected: Publisher Settings panel opens with workflow dropdown
steps.actual: Publisher Settings panel opened showing workflow dropdown with current selection

steps.action: Change workflow from 'Content Approval' to 'Direct Publish'
steps.expected: Workflow dropdown value changes to 'Direct Publish'
steps.actual: Successfully changed workflow selection to 'Direct Publish'
Twitter sharing checkbox was unchecked successfully
RSS feed was enabled successfully (checkbox checked)

steps.action: Verify RSS feed link appears in social icons after save
steps.expected: RSS feed link visible in social sharing area
steps.actual: RSS feed link appeared at bottom of page with other social icons

steps.action: Click Save button in Publisher Settings panel
steps.expected: Settings are saved and page refreshes
steps.actual: Settings were saved successfully, page refreshed

steps.action: Verify settings persistence by checking social icons on page
steps.expected: Social icons reflect saved settings (Twitter removed, Pinterest and RSS added)
steps.actual: Social icons showed Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS (Twitter removed)

steps.action: Change workflow to 'Content Approval' and click Cancel
steps.expected: Changes are discarded and workflow reverts to saved value
steps.actual: Workflow reverted to 'Direct Publish' after clicking Cancel

steps.action: Navigate to Module Settings > Publisher Settings tab
steps.expected: Publisher Settings tab shows Top Tags Page Size dropdown
steps.actual: Publisher Settings tab displayed with Top Tags Page Size dropdown (default value: 5)

steps.action: Change Top Tags Page Size from 5 to 10
steps.actual: Top Tags Page Size changed to 10 successfully

steps.action: Click Update to save and verify persistence
steps.actual: Setting persisted - Top Tags Page Size showed 10 after reload

steps.action: In Publisher Settings tab, change Top Authors Page Size from 5 to 3
steps.actual: Top Authors Page Size changed to 3 successfully

steps.action: Click Update to save and verify persistence
steps.actual: Setting persisted - Top Authors Page Size showed 3 after reload

steps.action: Verify Top Tags Page Size dropdown options
Verify Top Authors Page Size dropdown options

observations: The Publisher module has two separate settings interfaces: (1) Publisher Settings panel accessed via gear icon for workflow and social sharing, and (2) DNN Module Settings dialog for Top Tags/Authors Page Size accessed via Module Actions > Settings
Social sharing options include Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Pinterest, and RSS - all can be toggled independently
Workflow options available: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, and custom workflows

The suggested test scenarios for 'posts per page', 'default view mode (list/grid)', and 'featured post count' were not found in the Publisher Settings UI - these settings may not exist or are configured elsewhere
The 'Reset to default settings' functionality was not found as a dedicated button - settings must be manually changed back to defaults
An intermittent 'Object reference not set to an instance of an object' error occurred during one settings update, but subsequent updates worked correctly
